INSERT INTO family (familySeq, famCode, familyOwner) VALUES (familySeq.nextval, #{famCode}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT familySeq FROM family WHERE famCode = #{famCode} AND ROWNUM<=1

SELECT * FROM itdaUser WHERE familySeq = #{familySeq} order by userAge DESC
